sent.orig: It features fine marbled meat where fat meat minutely blends with tender lean meat.
sent.trans: 其特点是，脂肪细细地渗透进入柔软的瘦肉中，形成被称为霜肉的高品质牛肉。

sent.orig: Meat grinders are able to grind meat into meat paste.
sent.trans: 绞肉机可以把肉绞成肉糜。

sent.orig: You can preserve meat or fish in salt, but I prefer fresh meat to preserved meat.
sent.trans: 你用盐保存肉或鱼，但我喜欢新鲜肉胜过腌制的肉。

sent.orig: Bacteriological sampling in slaughterhouses and at premises producing minced meat and meat preparations.
sent.trans: 屠宰场及肉分割、切碎以前场所的微生物取样。这。

sent.orig: The production line of flat-panel quick-frozen by the machine, take the meat machines, meat baggingequipment constituted.
sent.trans: 鱼糜是加工鱼肉制品的第一道重要工序，对生产设备特别是冷冻设备要求极高。
